## IResponse interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The raw response from a service including any (xhrs) requests and responses and meta information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IResponse 
```

## Remarks

A [IResponse](./core.iresponse.md) can be transformed into a [IResourceResponse](./core.iresourceresponse.md) which extracts the most relevant data from an [IResponse](./core.iresponse.md)<!-- -->.

Service repositories should create their own response class implementing [IResponse](./core.iresponse.md)<!-- -->.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [content](./core.iresponse.content.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The page body (usually html) of the response. |
|  [main](./core.iresponse.main.md) | [IResponseResponse](./core.iresponseresponse.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The main request &amp; response chain. See [IResponseResponse](./core.iresponseresponse.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [meta](./core.iresponse.meta.md) | [IResponseMeta](./core.iresponsemeta.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Meta data about response. See [IResponseMeta](./core.iresponsemeta.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [page](./core.iresponse.page.md) | [IResponsePage](./core.iresponsepage.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The main page response. See [IResponsePage](./core.iresponsepage.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [xhrs](./core.iresponse.xhrs.md) | [IResponseResponse](./core.iresponseresponse.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Any XHR request &amp; responses. See [IResponseResponse](./core.iresponseresponse.md)<!-- -->. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [toResources()](./core.iresponse.toresources.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Creates a [IResponseResponse](./core.iresponseresponse.md) from an [IResponse](./core.iresponse.md) instance. |
